properties.areaDesc: Richland; McCone; Garfield; Wibaux; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Prairie
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 2:19PM MST until January 16 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
...DANGEROUS WIND CHILLS EXPECTED THROUGH AT LEAST THURSDAY...

.Wind chills of 20 to 40 below zero are expected at times from
this evening through at least Thursday. Areas near the Canadian
border may need Wind Chill Warnings eventually, particularly
Wednesday and Thursday mornings. Frostbite can occur in as little
as 10 minutes in these conditions, so make sure to dress properly
if you must venture outside.

* WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below
zero.

* WHERE...Portions of northeast Montana.

* WHEN...Until noon MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST THURSDAY
